about_the_game:
Office building? High-rise apartments? Or just a modern dungeon for your final boss? Climb to the top and check out the skyline with our Skyscraper tileset for RPG Maker!

The Skyscraper tileset includes:

Ground tiles:

Grass
Sand
Concrete
Asphalt
Tile floor (light and dark)
Dark marble floor (one with tan inset)
Grate floor
Black and white tabletops, counters and tubs
White road stripe and warning stripe
Fences
Rug
and more!

Wall Tiles:

Wall panels
Tile wall
White, gray, tan and marble walls
Grate wall
Adjustable-width windows (several styles)
Fancy walls with tan and marble inlays
Fancy gold stripe wall
Pin stripes in brown and black
Several metal and concrete designs
Book wall
Several roof styles

Also includes:

Stairs to match floors
Lots of paintings in various sizes
Two styles of configurable cabinets – assemble to make bookcases, kitchen cabinets, bedroom furniture or whatever else you need.
Built-in appliances
Two styles of beds (in single and double)
Couches and chairs
Curtains in two colors
Various interior decorations
Luxury office furniture
Everyday office furniture, with filing cabinets, whiteboards, computers and more
Utility and pipe works – valves, switches, two sizes of pipes
Trash and dumpsters
Diagonal stairs (can be configured to be taller)
Radio towers and other communications
Helicopter with helipad
and more!

Events and Animations

Helicopter (left and right facing) with still frames, slow rotating frames and flying frames.
Fountain animation
Parking ticket machine
Doors in lots of styles
Blinking light
Elevator
Valves and switches


UPDATE January 2025:

* Minor art updates, bugfixes


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
